website_summaries.verdict: The Kodak EasyShare Z712 IS has a few minor flaws but none that really outweigh the quality of the giant 12x zoom lens and efficient optical image stabilisation system.  Although processing is slow and some of the controls feels unwieldy, image quality is excellent

customer_reviews.title: my former one finally stopped working after 9 years of real good and constant picture taking
customer_reviews.text: this is my second Kodak Easysharc camera. my former one finally stopped working after 9 years of real good and constant picture taking. i could have bought another brand and style, but this camera is super. it is so durable and takes outstanding pictures. The seller even included two batteries. Thanks. It was advertised and arrived in excellent condition. It was well packaged and arrive promptly. The pricing was more than good. Thanks Amazon. I'm happy and taking pictures AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: NanaP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera. Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. Awesome price. The many features are almost mind boggling but it is a little camera that delivers a big result.Came well packaged and protected. All software and a detailed instruction manual included. You can`t go wrong if you are an amateur just starting out. I would advise you also purchase a rechargeable battery kit which is sold separate on Amazon. The battery that comes with it is NOT rechargible.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Fillyaw

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that they even still made this camera. I purchased mine from Amazon in April, 2008. It is still my go to camera for most of the pictures that I take. My one complaint, but not enough of one to deduct a star, is that it is a battery hog. I might get several months, more or less, out of the batteries that I use. I have never used rechargeable, as I do not want to wait for charging. So, in a nutshell, I am happy, happy, happy with this camera. I even had one of my bird pictures published in a bird magazine.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbrun

customer_reviews.title: Kodak z712 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th Kodak Easyshare camera that I have owned and I have loved them all. I just keep upgrading to get more megapixels and better features, and I haven't been disappointed in any I have bought! I passed down my other camera's to my daughters to use, and the pictures are still great quality in those too. I really haven't used the Z712 enough to really know what all it can do, but I love the zoom on it already with the stabilization installed. The EasyShare software with the online storage is worth every penny of it. I will continue to buy the EasyShare cameras and would recommmend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S. Wingate

customer_reviews.title: Kodak Easyshare Z712 IS
customer_reviews.text: This camera is an upgrade purchase from a DX 6490. I like the added features. It makes the camera much more "user friendly." The only problem I still have with these cameras is the "lag" time that you get when taking a photo. What you see on the screen when you take a picture is not what you get when the camera finally snaps the shot. I have a two-year-old, and he doesn't stay still long enough for those quality photo moments. I haven't tried outdoor shots yet, so maybe these will be better, since a flash is not usually needed. Overall, a nice camera for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Was a lot of camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid, lots of great features for a great price. I ignored several negative reviews and bought this camera anyway. Boy, I'm glad I did. I don't believe any other product could provide this much camera for the money. Great pictures, great zoom, nice and compact, just great. Only drawbacks I've noticed: The supplied battery isn't rechargeable, and you can't recharge the battery inside the camera - you have to buy a rechargeable battery and an external charger. However, please note that I purchased the camera for $192. I see that it is now priced at $402, which I think is too expensive. Boy did I get a deal!
customer_reviews.author: John in PS

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a previous Easyshare camera and have been greatly pleased with the purchase. I love that the Easyshare cameras are so simple to use. Love the zoom, that was my main reason for buying this model. Took the camera to Mexico right after I got it the colors of the ocean turned out awesome. My only complaint(about Kodak cameras in general) they give very little warning before the battery dies, at least this cameras batteries can be bought about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was in WAY BETTER SHAPE then listed in description. It arrived quickly and was packed well. It was bought for my niece for a Christmas gift and I told her that if she did not want it, I would take it to replace my current camera. Thank you for allowing me to buy used something for my niece that I could have not even started to afford new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice camera but where's the charger?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife because I got the same model a couple-3 years earlier. They made a few improvments to it, suck as how you can zoom in on things after you start videoing. I couldn't do that on my camera. Had to zoom before I started the video. But I was extremely disappointed in the fact that there was no battery charger included with the camera. We had to hunt down and buy a seperate set. That got the camera 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: KODAK EASYSHARE Z712 IS DIGITAL CAMERA  7.1MP
customer_reviews.text: I love this Camera. Has all the features i need and takes great photos. The 12x optical zoom is great for getting in close on distance subjects. Easy to opertate has many settings. Gives me clear photos with it's image stabilazation feature. Has a fast shutter and good size LCD. 7.1 MP is all most need rather than spending extra money for larger MP. Larger MP are only necessary for Poster size prints anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera...but...
customer_reviews.text: We are super pleased with the quality of the camera. Picture quality is awesome. However, batteries drain super quickly. It doesn't work with just double A batteries...you have to use the C2 (Double AA's taped together) and they need to be Kodak. We have bought rechargeables...don't work. So, if you are willing to spend $10 everytime you need a set of batteries...it's worth it. Again, the camera is our favorite and the best...you will see us paying $10 for batteries...
customer_reviews.author: Two sweet girls and two busy boys!

customer_reviews.title: Kodak Z712 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my daughter and son-in-law. They love it. Takes great pictures and easy to use. They insert photos in their emails to us, which is great. I have purchased three Kodak Easyshare cameras previously and have taken literally thousands of pictures with them. Very easy to use, and the software works great for processing the photos and files after downloading to my PC.
customer_reviews.author: G.T.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic camera, with better options and resolution than most point-and-shoots. If you're looking for easy-to-control manual settings, you should be looking at an SLR. If your looking for better-than-average photo capability, this is your camera. I find it to be very light for it's size, easy to hold, and easy to take pictures. The menus are fairly self-explanitory. The "manual" settings are not intuitive, and changing them is not really fast or easy, but they are there. For me, it's a cheap alternative to an SLR that I don't have spend all my time worrying about.
customer_reviews.author: Revka

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a very powerful zoom (12X). Like my last Kodak Easy Share, it is easy to take great pictures - just let the automatic settings do the work. Settings can also be adjusted for the more intricate shots. The colors are true to life and the camera is not too bulky. My daughter has a much more expensive Cannon and was quite impressed with this camera. Price was great on Amazon with no shipping charge. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MaCeMa

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I lost my Kodak easy share Z712 IS camera, and I loved it so much I replaced it. The one I recieved was in excellent condition, and works beautifully. I recieved it a little earlier than expected. I'm thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Carl

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace another highly rated digital that I never "bonded with." That might sound stupid, but I love taking pictures and need to have a great working relationship with my camera. This one may be my soul mate. I love the big LCD review screen and the purring sound the motor makes. I did a portrait of my friend's dog yesterday and she was delighted with the results!
customer_reviews.author: ShakenManchild

customer_reviews.title: kodak camera
customer_reviews.text: i really love this camera. very easy to use without reading tons of instructions. this purchase did not come with a usb. i have been trying to purchase one and have found 2 advertised and i purchased both of them from separate sellers and both cords do not fit the camera. i have an windows xp that does not recognize the sdhc card that this camera uses so i have been unable to download my pictures from the camera. but the camera is great
customer_reviews.author: pamela sue fuller

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera for the price. The pictures have really great detail. The "burst" option is a great feature, too. The "burst" option lets you take 6+ pictures at a rapid pace. The only down side to the camera that I found is the software that comes with it. I found it to be a little tricky to use. You can not bypass the software either. But, I bought a USB SD card reader and will probably uninstall the software. Overall, I have been extremely satisfied with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Salvino

customer_reviews.title: Nice improvements, but still lacking
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the dx7590. The Z712 drops the external flash connection Ugh! I need that. Also does not come with rechargeable battery. The Z712 does not improve on the indoor ability, still pathetic (this is why the flash connection is important.) Great outdoors though. Great speed in start up and between pictures, a ton better than the dx7590. Image stabilization not worth mentioning, can't really tell that it does anything. Good manual controls. GREAT price for a 7mp 12x zoom.
customer_reviews.author: N. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Kodak EasyShare Z712 IS 7.1MP Digital Camera with 12x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom
customer_reviews.text: At first I did not think I was going to like it, we went to a graduation that the curtains were dark and the cloths were dark and the camera just could not pick up the pictures well. I really feel it was just to dark in the room because everything else has turned out beautiful. I really love my new camera, it takes wonderful pictures. It is easy to use, I am like several others I have read the lens cover does not stay on well and I feel Kodak needs to improve this. I have ordered a battery charger and extra batteries so I will not have to use so many batteries. Overall I a very well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's a good piece and I've only had to invest towards getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera ages ago - not sure why I wasn't asked to post a review then... :) Anyways, it's a good piece and I've only had to invest towards getting the SD card compartment.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this camera! I love that there's no shutter delay & takes great action shots. The red eye feature is great, too. I don't know why people are complaining about the battery, I have been using the one that came with it & it hasn't died yet. My old camera with the AA batteries would've died LONG ago. I just bought a rechargable lithium one on Amazon anyway for a good price. Takes great shots in low light, too. Great for those bar party pictures!! :) I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Erin N. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is wonderful. Being a complete novice in the use of digital cameras, this is so easy. Basically the camera can do everything for you, or you can use it with manual settings. The pictures are exceptionally clear. The software is easy to use for downloading onto your computer. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Kodak 712 IS
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great and every thing I expected. The only thing I have a small complaint about is, although the camera was at a very reasonable price I had to spend more money getting a rechargable battery and a charger. I would have prefered that the camera was listed with and without these options.
customer_reviews.author: PCK

customer_reviews.title: Incredible bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has all the bells and whistles if you want them: full manual control, shutter priority, aperture priority, panoramas, closeups, 12X optical zoom, image stabilization, high ISO, and so much more. All at a cost at least one-third less than its competitors. Oh, yes, and it takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: PC Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love everything about this camera so far! It is exactly what I was looking for. It has beautiful quality pics and a great amount of zoom. I would recommend this camera to anyone. And as always it was delivered faster than expected and in perfect condition. Thats why I shop amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this camera for over four years and still favor it compared to the new higher pixel cameras of now! Awesome zoom and has many features I love. Best part is the fast shutter speed.
customer_reviews.author: Minime

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera- Excellent quality with this price
customer_reviews.text: I have just bought this camera. It's incredible. The pictures very clear and good quality. Light weight and smaller than other SLR like cameras. I like every things of this camera except the LCD screen. In evening, the image viewed through LCD has un-wanted "noise", but when the picture was taken then the "noise" was gone. Anyway, this camera is worth to buy.
customer_reviews.author: handsome spider

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. The pictures are clear and sharp, features are easy to use. This is my second digital camera, I did NOT like my first one, but decided to try one more and I am so glad I did. Recommend this camera to anyone wanting a camera that has zoom, large viewing area, and easy to use extras.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: I am not a great photographer, but with this camera, I take great pictures. Easy to operate (easier yet if you read the book). The zoom lens takes remarkable pictures of birds, deer, all kinds of nature. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this camera for a few days, but it has already far surpassed my expectations. Any/all reservation I had after reading other reviews, have been eliminated. So far it has performed flawlessly and does everything I wanted (and a lot more).
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replaces a Kodak Easyshare Z710 that was stolen. This is an upgrade to that model and so far I love it as much and have had the same great quality pictures. It is compact yet pictures are comparable to SLR. Another great quality is the battery life. Doesn't use AA so the batteries last much longer. In previous stolen camera a battery lasted more than one year. Considered purchasing new Easyshare Z models but they are not the same quality...cheap body style and design. Would definately recommend the Z712!!
customer_reviews.author: photo lover

customer_reviews.title: Billy Buoy
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera. It is very quick for multiple shots. My only problem is with the focus. I had an earlier model of this camera that kept in focus while zooming in and out, this one blurs till done focusing. Overall though this camera is more than worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Mullican

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Camera great exactly what i expected and hoped. Batteries however nogood. Delivery time exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Roch Moisan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: This a wonderful camera.........the best digital I have ever used. There is no shutter delay when taking action shots. The zoom is amazing. Close up images come out very clear and sharp, even when enlarged. I am VERY happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Currie

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera it takes really nice pictures for the price you pay compared to other cameras with the same optical zoom and MP this is a great bargain. Highly recommended but carry along spare batteries. I have found that the Lithium batteries have actually a longer duration time.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use camera
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I like this camera. There are lots of options for him to play with but it is simple enough for me to just grab and snap pictures without messing with settings. I didn't install the software because I had a Kodak previously and the software is a nuisance. I really like how quickly the camera adjusts to the subject and snaps the picture.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hermann

customer_reviews.title: The product is good and the delivery was really fast but the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is good and the delivery was really fast but the battery was bad,and so I was not sure if the camera was working properly. So I had to purchase new battery first to make sure that it wasn't the camera ,so I was a little concerned at first but the camera is really good and like I said the delivery was very fast so all in all it turned out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Moore

customer_reviews.title: CAREFUL, WRONG LISTING
customer_reviews.text: Hello. Please be advised that the low price advertised here of $119.99 from Heartland America is a mistake, I bought this camera from them and it turned to be an error and the camera is not available from this seller, Heartland America.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRES TAPIAS

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my husband for Christmas after many recommendations from friends and family. He owns a graphic design company so he's very picky about his electronics, especially his cameras. We love the pictures it takes. It's also very easy to use. I'm not at all technically inclined and I can easily use it. It looks a lot bulkier in the picture of it, but it fits into his back pocket easily. We really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: The camera was shipped out immediately and arrived in perfect condition very quickly. Everything was exactly as described and I wouldn't hesitate to buy a Kodak camera in the future or shop with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this camera about a year now and have been very pleased. I like the zoom capabilities and the colors the camera produces. Some people complained about the battery life, but I bought two rechargeable batteries for it and haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Holt

customer_reviews.title: Kodak user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I've used this camera twice already and it is very easy to use. the picture quality is beautiful. This camera is good for someone who loves to take pictures and trying to get into the hobby of it.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price and camera. Replaced older model just like it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: tricia cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with the results from this camera. It is easy to use and has many manual features that are very good.
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera "kodak easyshare"
customer_reviews.text: I bought Kodak Easyshare Z712 digital camera 2 months or so ago. It was reasonably priced (approx.$210). It is quite easy to use and meets more than my limited needs! It is working out well and I am happy with it. One feature that It is missing is the ability to recharge the battery within the camera. I got a charger and a battery ($22) from RadioShack and the problem is solved.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad Nimmagadda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was an excellent upgrade from my 3 year old Kodak Z700. The 12 power optical zoom is awesome as is the image stabilization. Another great product from Kodak.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey Cobra

customer_reviews.title: S U P E R
customer_reviews.text: I'm really loving this camera. I can hold it with one hand, zoom in on someone across the room and get a fantastic photo. It's a winner. Sarah Lowell
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had a camera just like this for a few years. That's why I was glad to be able to find one like it. I haven't had a chance to use it much yet, but the pictures that I have done have been really good. Hopefully it will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Speta

customer_reviews.title: Kodak EasyShare Z712
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. And it arrived right on the date they said it would. Very pleased with the product and the service.
customer_reviews.author: JKC

customer_reviews.title: DEAD WHEN COOL
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera from Amazon in Oct 2007, and have taken about 5,000 photos. It worked well for a while, but uses batteries with relish. Now, when cold, [about 40-50 degrees] it refuses to turn on or stay on, even with new batteries. I went to the Kodak support site, and entered my problem [camera does not turn on]. I was told it would cost $100 to repair plus shipping and taxes. 100 bucks to repair a 200 dollar camera is crazy. I now will buy the Panasonic of my dreams. By-by Kodak!!
customer_reviews.author: I read

customer_reviews.title: Have to send back defective
customer_reviews.text: I have used several Kodak Easyshare cameras over the years and know several people that have and love this camera. I do believe I received a defective camera and the seller has agreed to let me return it for a refund. I also do not think this reflects on the camera itself.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste J. Finewood

customer_reviews.title: New Granddaughter Pictures
customer_reviews.text: This new camera was specifically bought because we were expecting a new granddaughter and had given our old camera to our son & daughter-in-law. We love it and the pictures are absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Cmorgan

customer_reviews.title: Kodak easyshare 712
customer_reviews.text: I was really suprised at how clean the camera was. It was just like it said my son loved it . BEST deal that I have ever bought ....
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Keels

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful camera for the price and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Z712 Camera. I think it beats the higher priced cameras for ease of use and great pictures. The first Z712 lasted for over five years with daily use, it went everywhere. It still took great pictures, however, it was time for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D. Otto

customer_reviews.title: What a Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera! This is also why I use Amazon to purchase things. I used the feedback from Consumer Reports and the other customers who have purchased this item from Amazon and they were right, this is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Jett

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second EasyShare camera and we love it! The zoom is great and we like that we can zoom while taking video. The other cameras we looked at in this price range didn't have that feature. This is a great camera and very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Call

customer_reviews.title: EasyShare Z712IS
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research before deciding on this camera. I had opportunity to use the Z650 quite a bit in the past year and I feel that the Z712IS adds to the 650 in zoom quality, image stabilization and image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Castle

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this refurbished camera to replace our original one of the same type. The refurbished works just as well as the new one did.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Kodak EasyShare Z712 IS
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this product - the first being accidentally damaged beyond repair - which well demonstrates my fondness - all around - for this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick P. Woodson

customer_reviews.title: every bit as good as a $1000 DSLR!
customer_reviews.text: this great camera has almost all the features of a $1000 DSLR. Clearly the top of its class right now.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Vonerichsen

customer_reviews.title: kodak 712IS
customer_reviews.text: the camera takes incredible shots and remarkable videos. the 12x optical zoom, the automatic iso, and the overall features are great. the camera design is impressive
customer_reviews.author: Rae-ann Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and does great pictures. Was so pleased with product we purchased another one. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: So many features like 12x zoom plus n-number of options for taking pics just for 186$ what else can one ask for..
customer_reviews.author: Jyoti P. Mahalik

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for compact camera with better zoom capabilities. The Z712 has a great zoom function without being bulky. It has met our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Connie G. James

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera, I am having so much fun with it. you can't go wrong with the Z712IS and a geat price too.
customer_reviews.author: Walter F. Hixson

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice, kind of cool. I like it very much. The picture is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoyan Hu

customer_reviews.title: The greatest camera.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for the 12 time zoom, but I got so much more. It does everything you could think of and does it the best.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Kodak 712IS Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Easy to use. Delivered quickly in good order by vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Have used my Z712 for all things I can think of and I love it. The zoom is fun and creats very good prints at high power and no tri-pod. One BAD thing is no charger or batteries!
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt of this camera, we opened the box and found it very intuitive to operate. Nice, large screen on the back, good feel and heft, with apparent decent build quality. The problem came, though, on closer inspection of the camera's power source. It uses a proprietary battery pack, and in looking for cost of backup batteries and chargers, it pretty much negates the initial cost savings of the camera, so we opted to return it for the Canon S3 IS. We're very happy with this model, though we miss the large screen of the Kodak.
customer_reviews.author: Cybrsrfr

product_meta.title: Kodak Easyshare Z712 IS 7.1 MP Digital Camera with 12xOptical Image Stabilized Zoom
product_meta.description: Kodak 1699511 7.1 Megapixel Easyshare Z712 Is Zoom Digital Camera 7.1 Megapixels ; 12x Optical Zoom; 2.5" Indoor/Outdoor Color Display; 32 Mb Internal Memory & Secure Digital Card/Multimediacard Expansion Slot; Features Hi-Iso Scene Mode & Cropping ; Perfect Touch Technology; Kodak Color Science; Video Print Options Including 4, 9 Or 16 Up Prints; Features Optical Image Stabilization & Quick Click-To-Capture Speed (0.26 Sec) ; 16 Scene & 5 Color Modes; Features Tv-Quality Video At 30 Fps ; Includes Digital Camera, Li-Ion Digital Camera Battery, Usb & A/V Cables, Neck Strap, Kodak Easyshare Software & Custom Camera Insert
feature_bullets: 7.1-megapixel CCD for prints up to poster-size
12x optical zoom; optical image stabilization; power: rechargeable lithium batteries
Record VGA video (640 × 480) at 30 fps with sound
32 MB internal memory; capture images to SD/MMC cards (card not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars223 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
